document.docAuthor: Pérez-Benavides, A. Lucía, Hernández-Baz, Fernando, González, Jorge M. & Riverón, Alejandro Zaldívar
document.masterDocTitle: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts.
Acanthoscelides
sp. ( Burks 1979 ) on
Phaseolus
spp. (Hansson & Aebi 2004),
Phaseolus vulgaris
L. (
Kenyon et al . 2015
),
Phaseolus coccineus subsp. coccineus var. coccineus ( Bonet 2008 )
*, and
Mimosa pigra
L. ( Hansson 2009 )*;
Acanthoscelides aequalis (Sharp)
on
Abutilon incanum (Link) Sweet ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides aureolus (Horn)
complex on
Astragalus bisulcatus (Hook.) A.Gray
,
Astragalus lentiginosus Hook.
,
Astragalus thurberi A.Gray
, and
Glycyrrhiza lepidota Pursh ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides biustulus (Fall)
on
Desmodium tortuosum (Sw.)
DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

on
Leucaena esculenta
(DC.) Benth ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides brevipes (Sharp)
on
Sida acuta Burm.
f.,
Sida rhombifolia
L., and
Sida spinosa
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

on
Rhynchosia longeracemosa M.Martens & Galeotti ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;

,

,

, and

*;

on

(DC.) Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

on

, and

DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

on

, and

(L.) Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

collinsii Britton & Rose

on

on

DC.( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

on

,

,

,

,

, and

on

,

(L.) DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*; Algorobius sp. on

Distribution. NEARCTIC: United States of America . NEOTROPICAL: Argentina * ( Hansson 2009 ), Belize * ( Hansson 2009 ), Brazil , Colombia * ( Hansson 2009 ), Costa Rica * ( Hansson 2009 ), Guatemala * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ), Honduras * ( Hansson 2009 ), Panama * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ), Peru * ( Hansson 2009 ), Trinidad & Tobago * ( Hansson 2009 ), Mexico .
